title: Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono | Biography & Facts | Britannica

quotes: Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono (born September 9, 1949, Pacitan, East Java, Indonesia) is an Indonesian military officer, politician, and government official who was the first popularly elected president of Indonesia (2004–14).
Following in the footsteps of his father, a middle-ranking officer, he entered the army after graduating from the Indonesian Military Academy in 1973.
